summary:
This vulnerability hacks a feature that allows ChatGPT to have long-term memory, where it uses information from past conversations to inform future conversations with that same user.  A researcher found that he could use that feature to plant ‚Äúfalse memories‚Äù into that context window that could subvert the model. 
A month later, the researcher submitted a new disclosure statement...
title: Hacking ChatGPT by Planting False Memories into Its Data
